title: Fate/stay night [Heaven's Feel] iii.spring song Anime Film Postponed in Japan Due to New Coronavirus Measures
description: Cinemas across Tokyo close this weekend after Governor Koike urged residents to stay home It was announced today that Fate/stay night [Heaven's Feel] iii.spring song has been delayed two days before release due to the new measures brought in by the local Toky…
